uniqueRules: Leg Stabilisers : If this unit does not move in a round, re-roll any hit rolls of 1 for that round.

behemothStats.hullEffect:
This unit reduces its Armour by 2, and one Missile Battery cannot be
used for the rest of the game.
behemothStats.legsEffect:
This unit reduces its Move by 2”. Once all Damage Thresholds are
passed, this unit loses the Leg Stabilisers special rule.
behemothStats.weaponsEffect: One UMH-1 Mass Driver cannot be used for the rest of the game.

name: America Heavy Battle-Mech

uniqueRules: Leg Stabilisers : If this unit does not move in a round, re-roll any hit rolls of 1 for that round.

behemothStats.hullEffect:
This unit reduces its Armour by 2, and one Heavy Munitions Hailfire
cannot be used for the rest of the game.
behemothStats.legsEffect:
This unit reduces its Move by 2”. Once all Damage Thresholds are
passed, this unit loses the Leg Stabilisers special rule.
behemothStats.weaponsEffect: One UMH-9 Stromcrow Cannon cannot be used for the rest of the game

name: Japan Heavy Battle-Mech

uniqueRules: Tesla Array: When firing this weapon, roll to hit as if targeting the firing unit. The firing unit is not damaged, but all other enemy units (including behemoths) within 4" are hit. After rolling to hit, you may reduce the Energy of this shot to increase the range of its effect by 1" for each point of Energy the shot is reduced by.
name: Flail Heavy Tank

uniqueRules: Reinforcing Cement : This weapon deals no damage. If it hits a destructible scenery piece, that scenery piece replenishes 3 Damage Points and removes all Collateral Damage tokens. If this weapon hits an Infantry unit, that unit must make a Fortitude roll, if it fails, it is destroyed.
name: Dingo LAV

uniqueRules: This unit may replace its Missile Pod with a Minigun or a Light Flamethrower for no cost
name: Wolverine Scout Buggy

uniqueRules: Self-Repair: When this unit is destroyed, instead of exploding it lands on the closest available spot. It is untargetable for the rest of this round. In the round up phase, roll a dice. On a 1-3 it is destroyed. Ond a 4-5 it replenishes 2 Damage Points, and on a 6 it replenishes 3 Damage Points.
name: Phoenix Command Gunship

uniqueRules: Drone Base: At any point during this unit's activation it may launch 4 Starsprite Drones. These Starsprite Drones are placed in a squad on the board, following disembarking rules as if this unit was their Transport. The Drone Base can do this each turn, with each new squad of Starsprite Drones operating individually, as part of this unit's Battlegroup. However, no more than 2 squads of Starsprite Drones may be in play at any time for each Ferrum Drone Base on the board. If a Ferrum Drone Base is destroyed, remove squads of Starsprite Drones as casualties immediately until there are no more than 2 squads per Ferrum Drone Base.
name: Ferrum Drone Base

uniqueRules: Short Range Drones: Squads of Starsprite Drones cannot be bought with points, instead only being used as part of a Ferrum Drone Base, and are worth 0 Kill Points. In addition, Starsprite Drones may not Reaction Fire and their Focus ability can be used to combine shots from its whole squad. Starsprite Drones always have the Scout Category, regardless of the Category of the vehicle that launched them.
Self-Destruct: Instead of making a shooting action, you may choose to remove this entire squad from the board as casualties.
name: Starsprite Drones

uniqueRules: Smoke Launchers: Instead of making a Shooting action, this squad may Launch Smoke. Until the end of the round, weapons targeting this squad and other non-behemoth units within 2" of any unit in this squad suffer a +2 Accuracy modifier
This unit may replace its Twin Cannon with a Flamethrower for no cost.
name: Katana Light Tank

uniqueRules: This unit may replace its Twin Avenger Railguns with a Quake Accelerated Mortar for no cost.
name: Gladius Heavy Tank

uniqueRules: Marksman Laser: The Accuracy of this weapon may not be modified by more than +2 total.
name: Scimitar Heavy Tank

uniqueRules: This unit may replace its Mythslayer Railgun with a HI-EX Demolition Cannon, FRAG Demolition Cannon, and Nemesis Minigun for no cost.
name: Broadsword Super Heavy Tank

uniqueRules: Hazard Suit: Re-roll successful Collateral Damage hits against this unit.
name: Hazard Suits

uniqueRules: Loader: This unit reduces its Shots value by 1 for every 2 Damage Points lost, instead of every 1 Damage Point.
name: Flak AA Team

uniqueRules: Smart Smoke: Instead of making a Shooting action, this squad may Launch Smart Smoke. Pick a friendly non-behemoth squad in line of sight that is in coherency. Until the end of the round, weapons targeting this squad and other non-behemoth units within 2" of any unit in this squad suffer a +2 Accuracy modifier
name: Longbow Howitzer

uniqueRules: Marksman Laser: The Accuracy of this weapon may not be modified by more than +2 total.
name: Crossbow Laser Artillery

uniqueRules: Loader: This unit reduces its Shots value by 1 for every 2 Damage Points lost, instead of every 1 Damage Point.
Mortar Round: This weapon cannot combine its fire from the Reduced rule.
Concussion Round: If a Garrison is hit by this weapon, all Infantry inside are moved away from the edges, and no Infantry can move to the edges during this round.
name: Mortar Team

uniqueRules: This unit may replace its Twin Minigun with AP and AA Multi-Missiles for +10 points.
name: Falcon Light Gunship

uniqueRules: Retro Thrusters: When deploying this squad, you may declare that it will deploy via Retro Thrusters. It is placed in Reserve. An Infantry unit may use one action during their activation to call in this squad from In Readiness. Place 1 unit from this squad within 6" of one of the Infantry units. Then place any other units from the squad within coherency. All of these units must be placed on Passable terrain, and cannot be placed within 3" of enemy units. The squad is free to activate during their Battlegroup's activation, but any Shooting attacks made by them suffer a +2 penalty to their Accuracy.
This unit may replace its AA Cannon with a Heavy Flamethrower for no cost.
name: EAA Columbus Battlewalker

uniqueRules: Scan Booster Unit: All Scan Tokens within 6" of this unit can be used by any non-behemoth friendly units within 6" Additionally if a friendly non-behemoth squad within 6" of the Scan Booster Unit makes a shooting action, it may use a Scan Token to re-roll any failed damage rolls against a single target for that shooting action.
name: Panda APC

uniqueRules: Incendiary Missiles: If this weapon hits a scenery piece, it causes 3D3 Collateral Damage tokens to be placed.
name: Archangel Tactical Bomber

uniqueRules: This unit may replace its Missile Cluster with a Bunker Buster for no cost.
name: Seraphim Bomber

uniqueRules: This unit may replace its Aggressor Cannon with a Twin Nemesis Minigun for no cost.
name: Polecat Buggy

uniqueRules: This unit may take an AA Battery for +10 points.
name: Vulture Troopship

uniqueRules: This unit may take an AA Battery for +10 points.
name: Vulture Dropship
